guide.title: Gentoo Documentation Project Mission Statement
guide.abstract: The mission statement for the Gentoo Documentation Project

body.p: The Gentoo Documentation Project was formed to address the need of complete documentation for Gentoo GNU/Linux. In doing so, the GDP team is commited to the creation and maintenance of clear, concise, and original documentation. We will protect our users and developers by the use of free and open licensing on all documentation. The GDP is commited to remaining a free and open project, and will abide by the Social Contract set forth by Gentoo GNU/Linux.
